time_markers.text: During the recent uprisings in Yemen
quotes: During the recent uprisings in Yemen, she supported the non-violent struggle for the safety of women and for women’s rights to participate fully in peace-building work.
The panel is set to hold its first meeting in September and is expected to submit findings — which will inform Ban’s report to member states — in the first half of 2013.
